attributes.action: Trigger a by-election when an MP or MSP defects to another party.
attributes.additional_details: The voters should be represented in parliament by a member of the party they voted for, not by a defector who prefers to change sides.
attributes.background: Ensure that voters have an MP or MSP of the party  they voted for at the last election.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
